description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play the XBOX version of the hit game "Nerts", otherwise known as the "World's Best Freaking Card Game!" Each player starts with their own deck of cards and then FIGHTS TO THE DEATH!... Well not exactly, you mostly just want to be the first player to get rid of their cards while trying to block other peoples piles! Are you ready?
